title: Block-Based Editor
description: Master Akira's intuitive block-based content editor
author: Akira Team

blocks.content: The block-based editor is the core of Akira Docs, providing a flexible and intuitive way to create and organize documentation content.

Text blocks with rich formatting
Code blocks with syntax highlighting
Image and media blocks
Callout blocks for important information
Table blocks for structured data
Toggle lists for collapsible content
Custom component blocks
Akira provides a comprehensive file management system that supports:

Hierarchical file organization
Drag-and-drop file uploads
Automatic image optimization
File version history
Asset library management

Nested folder structures
Customizable navigation
Metadata and tagging
Automatic table of contents
Linked references
